channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- BetterLinks – Shorten, Track and Manage any URL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- BetterLinks – Shorten, Track and Manage any URL

item.title: CVE-2021-24812|2024-08-03T19:42:17.340Z -- unknown -- betterlinks%20%E2%80%93%20shorten%2C%20track%20and%20manage%20any%20url
item.description: The BetterLinks WordPress plugin before 1.2.6 does not sanitise and escape some of imported link fields, which could lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues when an admin import a malicious CSV.
